Name: Mondo mediterraneo
Review Text: Best place in Amsterdam to enjoy fresh made authentic Italian food. I love their ravioli and pasta salads, stir fried mushrooms and meat balls

Name: Mondo mediterraneo
Review Text: We had a superb private-dining experience at Mondo with a group of colleagues. Good food, great wine and very friendly staff!

Name: Mondo mediterraneo
Review Text: Great place to have a (private) dining experience. Thanks a million Gianmarco and team - the food, drinks and coffee were great!

Name: Mondo mediterraneo
Review Text: Lovely, tasty food and hospitality. We arrived just before closing, tired from traveling and they welcomed and nourished us. Vegetables roasted and seasoned to perfection with a smoky cheese lasagna studded with vegetables. Robust meaty ‚Ä¶

Name: Mondo mediterraneo
Review Text: What a baby place and so delicious panini

Name: Mondo mediterraneo
Review Text: Amazing small Italian restaurant. Delicious dishes beautiful interior. Very warm and polite stuff.

Name: Mondo mediterraneo
Review Text: Very friendly service and tasty food! I tried an eggplant dish, a lasagne and a stuffed mushroom. All very tasty. Also the pastel de nata was a great dessert! Coffee was very good as well. The only thing I don't like is that I didn't see ‚Ä¶

Name: Mondo mediterraneo
Review Text: Mondo mediterraneo took care of our wedding meal at home! The food was great and also the service is very good. The food came in plates and bowls that we can directly put on the table and looks very nice. They are lovely people! And the shop is also a must go to... everything looks so nice.

Name: Mondo mediterraneo
Review Text: A location for a relaxing lunch with some friends. Beautiful and delicious food and a wonderful staff to support you during the meal. Great for casual relaxing occasions and discussions.

Name: Mondo mediterraneo
Review Text: Authentic, selecting very high quality of all the ingredients yet keeping it simple, every dish is excellent, all in a beautiful environment whit smile and courtesy of the owners and personnel. ‚Ä¶

Name: Mondo mediterraneo
Review Text: Fantastic food. You don't even have to be hungry to eat here. Just looking at the food will do that.

Name: Mondo mediterraneo
Review Text: This is a wonderful family owned place. We had a late lunch there and the Italian owner was prepping food for a catering set up later own. It was amazing to see all the fresh market ingredients. Food quality is excellent and always fresh ‚Ä¶

Name: Mondo mediterraneo
Review Text: Very cute Italian place with great food! Awesome sourdough bread, sourdough lovers need to give it a try!

Name: Mondo mediterraneo
Review Text: Lovely home made Italian food to pick up, I enjoyed a nice dinner with their delicious products. Will definitely visit again to fill up my pantry with Italian food!

Name: Mondo mediterraneo
Review Text:
Pure food, real people, great place.

Go there if you love Italy; the dishes are pure Italian goodness, the people are ‚Ä¶

Name: Mondo mediterraneo
Review Text: Authentic Italian place. It‚Äôs easy to find good food in Amsterdam. The reason I like this place so much is because this spot has it all. Tasty dishes, welcoming, cosy and relaxed atmosphere, indoor and outdoor seating, take away, affordable prices and owners that are passionate about what they do. Recommended!

Name: Mondo mediterraneo
Review Text: Nice place with friendly stuff . Good prices and tasty food ! Many vegetarian / vegan choices as well and good quality ingredients ! Either sitting in , or taking away , the food will never disappoint you . It‚Äôs a bit too oily to be honest , but it‚Äôs excellent quality Italian olive oil !

Name: Mondo mediterraneo
Review Text: Food is wonderful, taste is superb, delicious & fresh. Staff is super nice and the you can find the best italian products!

Name: Mondo mediterraneo
Review Text: Really good food and excellent service!

Name: Mondo mediterraneo
Review Text: The food is okay, but takes too long to have a simple dish there. We usually go for lunch on  Friday nearby, and this is one of the options. Is a bit expensive for the overall service (quality, waiting time, variety...). Is an option for casual lunch with friends.

Name: Mondo mediterraneo
Review Text: Amazing food! Everything was fresh and tasty. We had a lovely time and the two women working were super fun to be around!

Name: Mondo mediterraneo
Review Text: Amazingly fresh and authentic Italian food for takeaway. Best in Amsterdam!!

Name: Mondo mediterraneo
Review Text: Friendly staff, well thought out classy restaurant, attention to detail was spot on, small menu but resulted in well prepared, nicely presented and delicious food.

Name: Mondo mediterraneo
Review Text: I simply love this place! Real tasty italian food! Cosy atmosphere! Feels like home :)

Name: Mondo mediterraneo
Review Text: Food was amazing and service was fantastic! The staff is very friendly and welcoming! Located in a very nice neighborhood.

Name: Mondo mediterraneo
Review Text: Lovely place, great atmosphere and great people. The food is to die for!!

Name: Mondo mediterraneo
Review Text: Nice dishes. Also take away.  Perfect place For a cozy, wam and romantic lunch/dinner.
